div.p: Our Vision: Lakeview Community Schools: Graduates are innovative, collaborative, productive citizens demonstrating integrity.

div.div: Mission Statement - Achieving Quality Education for all Learners through Teamwork!
Vision Statement - Lakeview Community Schools: Graduates are innovative, collaborative,

Lakeview Community Schools are located in central Montcalm County and cover 206 square miles. The school district currently operates one elementary, one middle school, and one high school, serving 1,130 students.

We are committed to providing premiere services to the families of Lakeview Community Schools. A few highlights of our district include:
*Early Childhood Center: 4 Year old Preschool
*Unique learning opportunities for high school students include LCS Virtual Learning Center,

Dual Enrollment and Early College
*Safe, Secure & Healthy Learning Environment
*Rigorous Staff Evaluation Process
*Lakeview Youth Clinic

Lakeview Community Schools has developed unique partnerships with Spectrum Health and the Village of Lakeview. Our district has multiple agreements with Spectrum that provide the following: an athletic trainer throughout the school year, a dedicated school nurse and, unique to Lakeview Community Schools, our School linked Youth Clinic. Our partnership through the Village of Lakeview provides our students and staff an additional support through the utilization of a School Resource Officer. We are extremely fortunate to have strong partnerships with local businesses that provide an extra layer to monitor student health and safety.

In an effort to successfully reach our vision, Lakeview Community Schools developed a needs based bond that was supported by our community in February of 2013. With the successful passing, Lakeview added additional classroom space to the former Bright Start Elementary building (renamed Lakeview Elementary), making this one of the most attractive elementary buildings within Montcalm County. Other notable improvements throughout our district included:

New band instruments for our students who participate in the performing arts
12 new buses
Modernizing our high school science laboratories
One-to-one technology implementation in K-12
Building upgrades at Lakeview Middle School and Lakeview High School
We invite you to learn more about our schools by visiting our buildings and speaking with our dedicated staff members.

article.aria-label: Click here to Purchase Wildcat Merchandise Online

h3.a: Click here to Purchase Wildcat Merchandise Online

div.div: We now have an online store available to purchase Lakeview Wildcat merchandise! We have partnered with Your Custom Image, located in Edmore, MI, to provide Lakeview Wildcat clothing and other miscellaneous items. You will see that a few sports only a few items available right now, but we will be continually adding to the online store as the different sports seasons start. If you see a design that you would like on different clothing item, just contact Your Custom Image and they will make it happen. You can have items shipped directly to you or you can pick your order up in Edmore. Their contact information is on the online store site
